ygData.subject: Re: Oops dont do like me
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  We did the same thing.  I m constantly telling everyone to con stuff before they attack, because I ll end up receiving any bad faction hits they
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 22 Oct 1999, CYR, Thierry wrote:
>
> Well last night while praying for trains in mistmoore so me and another
> bardic friend could try to pick off a gypsie or a deathly usher i got bored
> and decided to go pull some stuff.... So i go to the cemetary, i see a
> named invisible npc with a book in hand named something like Ssinn or
> something like that. Hmmm i think to myself, maybe its the red robe npc and
> he's green to me and scowling ready to attack.
>
> Anyways, to make a long story short, i screwed up big time, Turns out it was
> a quest npc for the sol ro temple
> your faction with sol ro got worse

Heh. We did the same thing. I'm constantly telling everyone
to con stuff before they attack, because I'll end up receiving
any bad faction hits they take. But as usual they charged
right in and attacked, and considering we had three other mobs
on us at the time (yeah, another guy was pulling while this
was going on), I didn't have much choice but to help.

This book guy is like all shadowmen - he /cons ready to
attack, but is non-aggressive. Hail him. If he calls you a
piece of refuse, hit him with the faction song. He should
tell you about a quest to retrieve a flower from inside the
crypt. Go inside the crypt (walk straight in because on
either side of the floor is a pit trap). On the coffin
there's a bag, which is really a flower. Pick it up and give
it to the book. The flower respawns every few minutes so you
can do this over and over.

If you're beyond the point where the faction song helps, then
I hear there are other quests you can do to raise your faction
with Solusek Ro.

Always /con and hail new stuff before you attack.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
